hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and trazodone can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under Antidepressant drugs in BNF for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  paroxetine  and  trazodone  can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under Antidepressant drugs in BNF for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and treprostinil can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  paroxetine  and  treprostinil  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and triamterene can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  paroxetine  and  triamterene  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and trimethoprim can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  paroxetine  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and trimipramine can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  paroxetine  and  trimipramine  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Paroxetine is predicted to increase the exposure to trimipramine. Manufacturer advises monitor for toxicity and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Paroxetine   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   trimipramine .  Manufacturer advises monitor for toxicity and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both paroxetine and tryptophan can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. hasDitaContent.@value: Urokinase causes bleeding, as can paroxetine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Urokinase   causes   bleeding, as can   paroxetine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Paroxetine causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.
